DOC.brief_summary: The efficacy and safety of uterine artery embolization, as compared with standard surgical methods, for the treatment of symptomatic uterine fibroids remain uncertain. The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the uterine volume and tumor size reduction, symptomatic relief, complication, fertility, ovarian function and quality of life with uterine artery embolization for uterine fibroids comparing with standard surgical methods.
